name: Ask PokéProfs Tumblr Theme
description: fiaKaiera's - Ask PokéProfs Tumblr Theme An overhaul on the aesthetic on Tumblr following the theme of ask-pokeprofs on Tumblr. Gallery: http://fiakaiera.deviantart.com
additional_info: v2.1.7 (Jun 20 2016) - Adjusted page not properly aligned outside the dashboard (such as Activity, Followers, etc.) v2.1.6 (Jun 16 2016) - Adjusted box width due to changes in stylesheet making posts forced to start at the bottom of the sidebar v2.1.5 (Jun 10 2016) - Adjusted positions due to changes in stylesheet v2.1.4 (Mar 9 2016) - Removed style application to standalone blogs, making the theme only limited to the main site. v2.1.3 (Feb 23 2016) - [S2] Fixed answer time not displaying properly. v2.1.2 (Feb 19 2016) - Fixed HTML/Markdown not being displayed properly when editing a post in HTML/Markdown mode. v2.1.1 (Feb 19 2016) - [S2] Fixed Dashboard Notifications still being white, making it unreadable v2.0 (Feb 13 2016) - Added Season 2 Theme, which is now Default * Theme for Season 1 is accessible in the Theme menu - Added Font Option. (Default: Century Gothic, Season 2 Font) * Font for Season 1 is accessible in the Theme menu * An option is also available to revert to the Tumblr's original font v1.4.2 (Feb 13 2016) - Minor button fix v1.4.1 (Dec 21 2015) - Fixed misplaced buttons on messaging and queue v1.4.0 (Dec 20 2015) - Adjusted to fit new tumblr's theme and messaging buttons v1.2 (Oct 24 2015) - Fixed Ask & Submit Box Overflow - Fixed Dashboard Displaced from fix stated above v1.0 (Oct 08 2015) - Released Theme

style_setting_options.label: Season 2 (White) [Default]
Season 1 (Red)
Season 2 (Century Gothic) [Default]
